results.title: The Winger with Gordon Hill
results.creator_credit: Terry Ryan, Ray Marshall and Opix Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Focus on Soccer”.
Gordon Hill, Derby’s left-winger, shows that speed, accurate crossing and dribbling are vitally important to the winger’s game.

results.title: The Team with Manchester United
results.creator_credit: Terry Ryan, Ray Marshall, HTV and Opix Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Focus on soccer”
Sir Matt Busby, soccer’s most famous club manager describes with the help of the present Manchester United team, the essential elements of teamwork. Shows various tactical approaches and gives advice on building a balanced team.

results.title: The Striker
results.creator_credit: Terry Ryan, Ray Marshall and Opix Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Focus on Soccer”
Kevin Keegan, European superstar and top England forward, illustrates the principles behind successful goal scoring. He describes the most common scoring situations and demonstrates the techniques a striker needs to be able to take advantage of them.

results.title: The Midfield player with Trevor Brooking
results.creator_credit: Terry Ryan, Ray Marshall and Opix Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Focus on Soccer”.
England midfield man, Trevor Brooking, one of the Football League’s most stylish players describes the importance of the midfield role. He stresses that midfield players must possess all-round ability.

results.title: A History of the game
results.creator_credit: Terry Ryan, Ray Marshall and Opix Films
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Focus on Soccer”.
The first of a seven part series on soccer skills. Traces the history of soccer in England, and in the second half of the film Manchester City’s Mick Channon looks at the basic skills which every soccer player needs. Provides clear explan ations of training drills and relates these to actual match situations. Narrated by Hugh Jones.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Terry Ryan, Ray Marshall and Opix Films

results.title: The Goalkeeper - with Ray Clemence
results.creator_credit: Terry Ryan, Ray Marshall and Opix Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Focus on Soccer”.
England’s keeper Ray Clemence demonstrates the technique involved in safe goalkeeping including handling, clearances, and organising defences of set pieces. Also provides insight into the responsibilities of a goalkeeper in the modern game.

results.title: Learning about learning
results.creator_credit: Mitchell Grayson, American Psychological Association and National Educational Television
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Focus on behaviour: the science of psychology”.
Explores the different strategies employed in developing new theoretical concepts about the human ability to learn. These studies, conducted with human beings and animals, have led to changes in methods of instruction.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Mitchell Grayson, American Psychological Association and National Educational Television
